评论详情: Super cute mini tee but it does shrink so get a size larger

It is very cute, true to size and reasonably well constructed however the material is not very soft and sort of prickly so if you can’t tolerate clothes being a bit scratchy maybe try a different shirt. Or possibly wearing it with a different shirt underneath… hope this helps.

it doesn’t look exactly like the picture like kinda fades and grunge in the picture it looks very like brand new and clean which isn’t the look i was going for lol. sleeves are also longer then the pictures
The material is very stretchy, fits slightly differently than advertised but overall good quality, it is a baby tee but i like it a lot

I bought as a gift and was worried about sizing and shrinkage but after being washed on the gentle cycle and laid flat to dry, it still fit my daughter perfectly. It’s soft and looks nice, although I don’t know how long it will hold up since the material is thinner.
It fit When you're a bigger girl true to size is really nice
Perfect size for a baby tee! It’s super comfortable
very cute shirt and comfy quality but i cannot actually wear it because it came with a bad chemically smell that won’t really go away, maybe have to do a couple washes.

I order a size small it fits like a medium but that can easily be fixed with tailoring if you have a sewing machine at home but sizes are not true to size, when wash it does ruin the material of the print a bit.
This shirt looks exactly like the picture and fits perfectly, I will say because this shirt is made out of cotton and polyester. if you wear for a long period of time, it definitely will get itchy.

The shirt design matches pretty well but I wouldn't say exactly. I got a small and it's still not as tight as in the advertisement. The material is a little weird and where the design is placed, it's itchy.

评论概述: Medium fit was not accurate. It’s a crop top
评论详情: Ordered a medium and it isn’t long enough. Should state it is more of a crop top shirt.
BRAVO BRAVO <3 i am inlove with this texture and size, perfect. PLEASE BUY <3
Very nice print on the shirt. Image looks great. Comfortable to wear and looks great.
i love how it isn’t to big or to small but when it came it smelt so definitely give it some washes and then it’s good. 💗💗
